beginner.name: Daily Routines
beginner.starter_question: What do you do every morning after you wake up?
follow_up_questions: What time do you usually wake up?
Do you eat breakfast every day?
How do you go to work or school?

beginner.name: Family
beginner.starter_question: How many people are in your family?
follow_up_questions: Do you have any brothers or sisters?
Who are you closest to in your family?

beginner.name: Food
follow_up_questions: What foods do you not like?
What is a typical breakfast in your country?

beginner.name: Weather
follow_up_questions: What season do you like best?
What do you do when it rains?
Is it usually hot or cold where you live?

intermediate.name: Hobbies
intermediate.starter_question: What do you like to do in your free time?
follow_up_questions: How often do you practice your hobby?
When did you start this hobby?
Do your friends share your interests?

intermediate.name: Travel
intermediate.starter_question: Have you ever traveled to another country?
follow_up_questions: Where would you like to travel next?
Do you prefer the beach or the mountains?
What was your favorite travel experience?
